Articles.Content:
Ever wanted to ask someone else something? Here's the place to do it!

@adsii1970, as a history professor, what's your favorite historical event? Also, I've been trying to get into Civ, which I think you play, but I feel like it's not really very interesting. It seems like every turn is just fortify, fortify, go there, make this. I feel like I'd really like Civ if I could just "get it".
